== Introduction ==

NPC (Non-Player Character) in Ragnarok Online is written by script language.

This language is not complex but if you write to many lines, You may in trouble.

Syntax hilighter and Autocomplete can help you to write npc-script.

With color hilight and code template, you can release you npc faster!

== Guideline ==

  * Read npc-script command.
    * http://svn.eathena.ws/svn/ea/trunk/doc/script_commands.txt
    * http://eathena.ws/wiki/index.php/Scripting
    * http://www.eathena.ws/wiki/index.php/Category:Script_Command
    * http://www.eathena.ws/wiki/index.php?title=Category:Script_Command&from=Unitskillusepos

  * Read how to make syntax hilighter and autocomplete.
    * http://editplus.info/wiki/Syntax_file_format
    * http://editplus.info/wiki/Auto-completion_file_format

  * Development phase
